moves.name: Pound
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user's fist pounds the target.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: DoubleSlap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, 2-5 times in a row.

moves.name: Comet Punch
moves.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches, 2-5 times in a row.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: Pay Day
moves.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. May cause a burn.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. May cause freezing.

moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. May cause paralysis.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: ViceGrip
moves.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn.

moves.name: Cut
moves.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw. Can also be used to cut down thin trees.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party.

moves.name: Fly
moves.description: The user flies up on the first turn, then strikes on the next turn.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Vine Whip
moves.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. May cause flinching.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: Jump Kick
moves.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

moves.name: Rolling Kick
moves.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. May also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. May cause flinching.

moves.name: Horn Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak 2-5 times in a row.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. May cause paralysis.

moves.name: Wrap
moves.description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. Also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. Also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Twineedle
moves.description: The user attacks by jabbing the target twice in succession using stingers. May also poison the target.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. Hits 2-5 times in a row.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. May cause flinching.

moves.name: Acid
moves.description: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. May also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. May also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Surf
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. May also freeze the target.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing Pokémon. May also freeze them.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: BubbleBeam
moves.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Aurora Beam
moves.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Drill Peck
moves.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

moves.name: Submission
moves.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Low Kick
moves.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Strength
moves.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. Can also be used to move boulders.

moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. Has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

moves.name: Petal Dance
moves.description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: ThunderShock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn. Can also be used to exit dungeons.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.
